description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe for building and packaging BlueZ 5.66, the Linux Bluetooth stack userland components. It defines dependencies, configuration options, source URIs, build instructions, files to be installed, and other meta-data related to the BlueZ package.

methods.name: get_noinst_tools_paths
methods.description: Utility function to generate paths for tools not installed but built by BlueZ, based on the build directory and tools list.
